# NockPool GPU Miner

This miner links directly to your [NockPool account](https://nockpool.com/) via the `ACCOUNT_TOKEN` you supply in the recipe form.

## Setup checklist

- Sign up/sign in at [nockpool.com](https://nockpool.com/) and connect your wallet so a payout address is set.
- Generate your account token on the [NockPool Setup page](https://nockpool.com/setup) and keep it private. Rotate it if you believe it is compromised.
- Paste the token into this recipe; it is injected into the container as `ACCOUNT_TOKEN`.
- Have another miner? Review the [SaladCloud custom miner guide](https://docs.salad.com/container-engine/how-to-guides/miners/run-miners-on-saladcloud) to deploy any other miners.

## Payout notes

- Note that NockPool charges a fee on all payouts.
- Set your payout address, mine to earn NOCK, and request payout once you have at least **50.00 NOCK**; keep **20.00 NOCK** available for network fees.
- Payouts are processed once daily, using payout requests submitted by **12AM GMT**.

## Resources

- [NockPool Setup](https://nockpool.com/setup)
- [Recipe Source](https://github.com/SaladTechnologies/salad-recipes/tree/master/recipes/nock-gpu-miner)

## Priority Level
Default priority level is set to "lowest" to reduce cost. If you experience frequent interruptions, consider increasing priority by editing container group configuration. Learn more about priority levels in [SaladCloud documentation](https://docs.salad.com/container-engine/explanation/billing-pricing/priority-pricing).

form.title: Nock GPU Miner
form.description:
Mine NOCK using NockPool GPU miner. You'll provide a NockPool account token that links your miner to your wallet.

1. Sign up or sign in at [nockpool.com](https://nockpool.com/) and follow the [setup guide](https://nockpool.com/setup).
2. Connect your wallet in NockPool so your payout address is set.
3. Generate and copy your account token (starts with `nockacct_`) from the NockPool Setup page, then paste it into this form.
4. Keep the token private; it will be injected into your container as `ACCOUNT_TOKEN`.

### Payout reminders

- Note that NockPool charges a fee on all payouts.
- Set your payout address, mine to earn NOCK, complete KYC, and request payout once you have at least 50.00 NOCK (minimum 20.00 NOCK left for network fees).
- Payouts are processed once daily based on requests submitted by 12AM GMT.

Need to run a custom miner on Salad? See [the SaladCloud miner guide](https://docs.salad.com/container-engine/how-to-guides/miners/run-miners-on-saladcloud).
  
## Priority Level
Default priority level is set to "lowest" to reduce cost. If you experience frequent interruptions, consider increasing priority by editing container group configuration. Learn more about priority levels in [SaladCloud documentation](https://docs.salad.com/container-engine/explanation/billing-pricing/priority-pricing).
